Detailed Description

Drag and Drop type that encodes a DzPane pointer.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DzPaneDrag::DzPaneDrag ( const DzPane *  pane  ) 

Creates a new drag object that encodes a pointer to a DzPane object. This drag object provides the MIME type: "DAZStudio/pane-ptr"

Parameters:
pane A pointer to the pane to encode in this drag object
dragSource A pointer to the widget that generated this drag object.

Member Function Documentation

DzPane * DzPaneDrag::decode ( const QMimeData *  src  )  [static]

Convenience function for decoding the MIME type: "DAZStudio/pane-ptr"

Parameters:
src A pointer to a MIME source that encodes a DzPane pointer.
Returns:
A pointer to a DzPane object as decoded form src.
QByteArray DzPaneDrag::encode ( const DzPane *  pane  )  [static]

Convenience function to encode a pane pointer into the MIME type: "DAZStudio/pane-ptr".

Parameters:
pane The pane pointer to encode.
Returns:
A QByteArray containing the pointer encoded as MIME data.
